node.name: FAB Defense Glock Scope Mount
node.short_description: The FAB Defense Glock Scope Mount is a highly functional and cost-effective upgrade for your Glock handgun, enables an upper Picatinny rail for optics and a front underside rail for foregrips or flashlights.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Glock Scope Mount is a highly functional and cost-effective upgrade for your Glock handgun, enables an upper Picatinny rail for optics and a front underside rail for foregrips or flashlights.

 

Glock Scope Mount Advantages:

Accepts all 1913 MIL-STD Picatinny based sights
Durable and lightweight fiberglass reinforced polymer construction
Original sights remain functional
Quick and easy installation
Facilitates prompt sight alignment
Adds a front underside accessory rail in place of the used original

 

Glock Scope Mount Compatibility:

All GLOCK® 9mm/.40/.357 SIG models with accessory rail.

node.name: FAB Defense Harris Aluminium Bipod Mount
node.short_description: The FAB Defense Harris Bipod Mount allows you to mount any standard Harris Bipod to your M4 Bayonet Lug. Providing you with a firm and durable Bipod mounting-platform solution.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Harris Aluminium Bipod Mount allows you to mount any standard Harris Bipod to your M4 Bayonet Lug. Providing you with a firm and durable Bipod mounting-platform solution.

 

FAB Defense Harris Bipod Mount Advantages:

Ensures Bipod Stability and Reliability
Enhances Overall Weapon's Versatility
Mounts on the Weapon's Underside Picatinny or Weaver Accessory Rail
Keeps Your Handguards Clear for Optimal Versatility
Durable, Lightweight Polymer Construction

node.name: FAB Defense Mag Well Grip
node.short_description: The FAB Defense Mag Well Grip transforms the magazine well into a comfortable, close ergonomic foregrip for enhanced manoeuvrability and lower signature of operator in CQB.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Mag Well Grip transforms the magazine well into a comfortable, close ergonomic foregrip for enhanced manoeuvrability and lower signature of operator in CQB.

Combined with a magazine funnel for easier, faster, more reliable magazine change.

 

Mag Well Grip Advantages:

Provides a tight and close hold for speed and manoeuvrability in CQB
Prevents pressure on the magazine, reduce feeding-related malfunctions
Functions as a flared and extended magazine well and enhances reload speed. Allows yout to keep eye contact with the target during reload.
Quick and easy installation, no gunsmith required
Incorporates a serial number window
Durable and lightweight fiberglass reinforced polymer construction

 

Mag Well Grip Compatibility:

M16 5.56x45 lower receiver variants, without a flared magazine well.
The MWG is not compatible with PMAG-GEN3

node.name: FAB Defense Mono Pod Buttstock
node.short_description: The Mono Pod Buttstock from FAB Defense is a sleek and durable Mono-Pod add-on for the GL-SHOCK or GL-MAG Buttstocks for rapid deployment and fine adjustment.
node.description:
The Mono Pod Buttstock from FAB Defense is a sleek and durable Mono-Pod add-on for the GL-SHOCK or GL-MAG Buttstocks and features a two-stage, screw and spring-based extension for rapid deployment and fine adjustment.

 

Mono Pod Buttstock Advantages:

Provides additional support for more steady hold and extremely accurate shooting
Secure retaining mechanism prevents accidental deployment
Easily deployed and retracted into the buttstock by the push of a button
Top-quality rubber foot for enhanced grip on slippery surfaces
Two-stage screw and spring based extension for rapid deployment and fine adjustment
Made of reinforced high-grade polymer composite and 6061 hard anodized aluminum

 

Mono Pod Buttstock Compatibility:

GL-SHOCK & GL-MAG Buttstocks

node.name: FAB Defense PTK VTS Ergonomic Grip Combo
node.short_description: The FAB Defense PTK VTS Ergonomic Grip Combo combines a pointing foregrip with an additional thumb lock for secure grip and increased handling.
node.description:
The FAB Defense PTK VTS Ergonomic Grip Combo is a unique combination of a pointing foregrip, for ideal posture, with an additional thumb lock for secure grip and increased handling.

 

FAB Defense PTK VTS Ergonimic Grip Combo Features:

Provides natural grip positioning for point and shoot techniques
Ergonomic design prevents fatigue and Increase long term accuracy
Unique pointing grip and thumb lock combination for secure grip
Improves weapon handling and maneuverability
Maintains natural body stance
Allows versatile positioning for optimal user compatibility
Made of a single piece of extremely durable polymer composite
Provides an additional compartment for cleaning kit or spare battery

 

Included in the kit:

PTK – Ergonomic pointing grip
VTS – Versatile Tactical Support

 

Compatibility:

Under and side 1913 MIL-STD picatinny rails

node.name: FAB Defense Quick Detach Sling Swivel
node.short_description: Quick Detach Sling Swivel from FAB Defense
node.description:
Quick Detach Sling Swivel from FAB Defense

 

Quick Detach Sling Swivel Features:

Mounts To Any FAB Defense QD Port
Easily Attached with Swivel Clip Type Strap attachment
Secure Mechanism, Will Not Brake Free Accidentally
Made with Durable Steel, CNC Machined
Locks in Place by a Simple Push
Ambidextrous, May be Used on Right or Left Side
Easy Detach by a Push of a Button

node.name: FAB Defense Rubberised Ergonomic Foregrip
node.short_description: The new State–of-the-Art FAB Defense Rubberised, Ergonomically Designed, Tactical Foregrip.
node.description:
The new State–of-the-Art FAB Defense Rubberised, Ergonomically Designed, Tactical Foregrip.

 

FAB Defense Rubberised Ergonomic Foregrip Advantages:

Unique Comfortable Texture and Sleek Contour for Superior Hold
Compact Non-Slip Design for Use With or Without Gloves
Enhances Overall Tactical Versatility,1913 Picatinny Compatible
Convenient Waterproof Storage Compartment for Batteries, Cleaning Kits, etc.
Secure Mount with Durable QD Bolt Locking
Made with High-Quality Latex and Reinforced Polymer Composite Material

node.name: FAB Defense Ruger 10/22 Collapsible Stock
node.short_description: The R10/22 M4 Collapsible Stock Conversion Kit from FAB Defense presents a high quality and ability enhancing tactical upgrade for the Ruger 10/22.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Ruger 10/22 Collapsible Stock Conversion Kit is a high quality and ability-enhancing tactical upgrade for the Ruger 10/22.

This unique stock offers the perfect combination of a classic bench-rest design with a modern tactical versatility and buttstock features.

 

Ruger 10/22 Collapsible Stock Advantages:

1913 MIL-STD Picatinny side and lower rails
Allow secure mounting of any Picatinny based accessories
Quick and easy drop-in installation
Collapsible buttstock system with 5 length options
Side folding buttstock (left folding by default) for compact carry and storage
Quick-Detach sling swivel sockets on both sides
Ergonomic design prevents wrist fatigue and ensures secure grip
Finger grooves and backstrap shape improves trigger operation
Durable and lightweight fiberglass reinforced polymer construction
Incorporates a 25 years limited lifetime warranty

 

Ruger 10/22 Collapsible Stock Compatibility:

Standard and bull barreled Ruger® 10/22® rifles
All 1913 MIL-STD picatinny based accessories

node.description:
The FAB Defense Ruger R10/22 UAS Precision Stock Conversion Kit is a high quality and ability-enhancing upgrade for the Ruger 10/22.

This unique stock offers the perfect combination of a classic bench-rest design with a modern tactical versatility and buttstock features.

 

Ruger 10/22 Precision Stock Advantages:

1913 MIL-STD Picatinny side and lower rails
Allow secure mounting of any Picatinny based accessories
Quick and easy drop-in installation
Built-in adjustable cheek-rest with 5 height options
Side folding buttstock (left folding by default) for compact carry and storage
Quick-Detach sling swivel sockets on both sides
Ergonomic design prevents wrist fatigue and ensures secure grip
Finger grooves and backstrap shape improves trigger operation
Durable and lightweight fiberglass reinforced polymer construction
Incorporates a 25 years limited lifetime warranty

 

Ruger 10/22 Precision Stock Compatibility:

node.name: FAB Defense Scorpus Glock Belt Holster
node.short_description: The FAB Defense Scorpus Glock Belt holster was initially developed for a special LE agency that required a slim fitting design that would enable an easy draw of the handgun from a standing and sitting position.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Scorpus Glock Belt holster was initially developed for a special LE agency that required a slim fitting design that would enable an easy draw of the handgun from a standing and sitting position.

Scorpus® Level 1 Retention System- features two separate opposing passive retention devices that capture the trigger guard of the handgun and are pressure activated. To draw the handgun, the operator must firmly hold the grip and then perform a clean draw.

 

Scorpus Glock Belt Holster Features:

Excellent handgun protection in a slim and streamlined design
The Scorpus® Level 1 Retention System - Featuring two separate mechanisms, for truly secure hand gun retention.
Special finger channel design, keeps index finger safely positioned during draw
Fixed 24 degree Cant that enables comfortable drawing of the weapon while being seated and while standing
Fixed belt adapter enables a slimmer design, placing the gun closer to the body
Supports a new, wider belt loop design for easy threading, fits belt sizes- 33-58 mm(1.2”-2.2”)
Holster supplied with a non-interchangeable belt adapter configuration, a Paddle or Belt Loop
Available for Right Hand or Left Hand configuration
Durable fiberglass reinforced polymer composite construction

 

The Scorpus Glock Belt Holster is available for the following handguns:

Makarov PM
Glock 17, 19, 22, 23, 26, 27, 31, 32, 33, 34, 35, 41
Glock 20, 21, 29, 30, 40
Glock 43
SIG SAUER P226 models excluding the MK 25 & LDC models
S&W M&P 9/.40 Full frame and Pro models
H&K USP 9mm/.40/.45 Full-size models
Jericho full frame 9mm / .40 Steel or Polymer models
1911 5” Barrel, including Colt government models Railed and non-railed (not including Colt Rail Gun®)
CZ 75 SP-01 Shadow (Gen1)

node.name: FAB Defense Scorpus Glock Paddle Holster
node.short_description: The FAB Defense Scorpus Glock Paddle Holster has been developed for a special LE agency that required a slim fitting design that would enable an easy draw of the handgun from a standing and sitting position.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Scorpus Glock Paddle Holster was initially developed for a special LE agency that required a slim fitting design that would enable an easy draw of the handgun from a standing and sitting position.

The Scorpus® Level 1 Retention System features two separate, opposing, passive retention devices that capture the trigger guard of the handgun and are pressure activated. To draw the handgun, the operator must firmly hold the grip and then perform a clean draw.

node.name: FAB Defense Self Healing Target With Spare Board (Blue)
node.short_description: The FAB Defense Self-Healing Static Target is the perfect solution for both indoor and outdoor ranges, it is used for both rifle and handgun practice, law enforcement, military and recreational training.
node.description:
The FAB Defense Self-Healing Target is the perfect solution for both indoor and outdoor ranges, it is used for rifle and handgun practice, law enforcement, military and recreational training.

Suitable for use with any type of handgun or SMG ammunition, The Static Target contains no metal parts, eliminating ricochets and safe even at point blank range.

The RTS Target parts are all made from unique high-grade polymers ensuring shooter safety.

 

 

FAB Defense Self Healing Target Advantages:

Safe for use in all ranges, including point-blank target practice
Durable polymer recovers thousands of hits, no ricochets
Lightweight, easy to setup, transport and store
Perfect for sniper, handgun, and assault rifle training
Compatible friend / foe figure dressings available

 

Static Target With Spare Board Included in the kit:

1 Complete static target kit
1 Replacement self-healing target board
